title: SET_HELI_BLADES_FULL_SPEED
content:
0xA178472EBB8AE60D0x033A9408// SetHeliBladesFullSpeed
void SET_HELI_BLADES_FULL_SPEED(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The helicopter or the planeDespite its name, this works on Helicopters and Planes.Sets the speed of the helicopter blades to full speed.This is equivalent to calling SetHeliBladesSpeed(vehicleHandle, 1.0);
codeBlocks:
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for SET_HELI_BLADES_FULL_SPEED
SetHeliBladesFullSpeed(vehicle)
